msg.thaumcraft.not_unlocked: It seems that you don't know how to do that!
msg.thaumcraft.crystal_dreem_quest_start: Your fingers tingle strangely as you handle this crystal. What does that mean? Maybe some rest will inspire you.
msg.thaumcraft.crystal_dreem_quest_end: You awaken from a strange dream. You quickly write it down before the memory fades.
msg.thaumcraft.crystal_dream_quest_end_l: You quickly understand that something strange happened because this book appeared from non-existence.
text.thaumcraft.crystal_dreem_quest_book:
I had the strangest dream last night.

In the dream, I took three of those strange crystals I've been finding and ground them with a handful of redstone in a bowl, using a piece of flint.

The crystals had to be of different types, buf if I did it properly then the result was a strange, glowing dust.

In the dream, I took the dust and sprinkled it on a bookshelf, but the dream ended before I saw what happened.

I wonder, should I do what the dream showed?

I have the impression the dust was going to reveal something wonderous, but dangerous.
